{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3559171,"name":"","username":"Keller","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/keller/{size}/259062_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T13:26:33.497Z","cooked":"

Can i use a jetson orin nano for image processing with photon vision?
If I can, which image do I need to use?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-03-17T13:26:33.497Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":114,"reads":123,"readers_count":122,"score":639.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":495887,"topic_slug":"jetson-orin-nano-with-photon-vision","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66859,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/jetson-orin-nano-with-photon-vision/495887/1","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3559186,"name":"Adam","username":"lol","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/5daacb/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T13:44:02.065Z","cooked":"

Yeah, you can. We’re currently running this exact setup. It’s been reliable and quite effective so far.

See: Cuda Apriltag detection with Photonvision and https://github.com/FRC-Team-4143/photonvision/tree/jetson-orin

Install the GPU accelerated tag detection library, compile the linked GitHub repo on the Jetson, and run the resulting jar on startup. For best results, add in a ~15 second delay before starting photonvision. Also, I’d recommend a silicone conformal coating for the Jetson. I’ve heard of teams losing their very expensive coprocessors to aluminum shavings. We have ours in a 3d-printed case with a fine mesh over the air intake, for added protection.

Alternatively, if you want to be fancy and get slightly better performance, you can rig up a custom setup using isaac_ros_apriltag.

how many cameras do you use? can we use four cameras?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-03-17T13:59:53.835Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":100,"readers_count":99,"score":25.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":495887,"topic_slug":"jetson-orin-nano-with-photon-vision","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":56055,"username":"lol","name":"Adam","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/5daacb/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66859,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/jetson-orin-nano-with-photon-vision/495887/3","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3559273,"name":"Adam","username":"lol","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/5daacb/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T15:00:19.853Z","cooked":"

We use two Arducam USB OV9281 cameras at maximum resolution. You might be able to use four, but in order to do that you may need to use the CSI ports or lower your resolution, as the Jetson is somewhat limited in terms of USB bandwidth and sending a ton of data may cause instability/failure to get image feeds from certain cameras. Using different USB cameras may also help out a bit, but we’ve only really used the USB OV9281s, so I don’t know for sure.
